extendedInfo.description: When someone asks: "When is your wedding?", You can now say: "After 480 kisses!", OR "In 178,326 heartbeats!" OR "In precisely 184,072 minutes" Sharing your countdown via Email or Facebook!It's fun!, Wedding Countdown can countdown your wedding in many different units! Years, Months, Days, Hours, Minutes, Seconds, Heartbeats or Kisses! There's more: How about a Wedding countdown that can automatically turn into an Anniversary countdown after your Wedding! Key features: 4x1 WidgetFull landscape support Countdown for Wedding or Anniversaries Ability to automatically switch to anniversary countdowns after your wedding day Smart anniversary countdown, will automatically countdown to your very next anniversary. 1st, 2nd, 3rd etc. Many different units to measure your countdown. Few different phases to choose from Lovely default images to choose from Use your very own photos as the background Play your favorite music from your device while counting down! Premium in app purchase includes: 4x4 WidgetMultiple countdowns Custom phrases Ad Banner Removal Happy countdown!keywords:Wedding, Anniversary, Planning, Planner, Bride, Celebration, Timeline, Party,Wedding Day, Countdown

reviews.title: Simple & good app
reviews.comment: Cool app. I can check it anytime.. does not make ur phone hang..good back ground wallpapers. I like it :) I know exactly by how many months, weeks, days, hours, mins & secs away I am before I say \"i do\" :D
reviews.author: Pritha Sarkar

reviews.title: It\'s cute, but doesn\'t Remember You
reviews.comment: I liked this app so much that when I asked my friend where she got it i downloaded on my phone and paid for the.service to use my pictures. But when i changed phones, i lost the service i paid for. Now im not as happy with it!
reviews.author: Janelle Alyce

reviews.title: Just one thing
reviews.comment: I wish the countdown began at midnight, not the time of the event. In the morning I\'ll have 175 days until, then in the afternoon I have 174 days until... uhm... that\'s just too awkward!
reviews.author: Melissa Albery

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: Been counting down without fail for the past 12+ months...only 5 weeks left for me till my beach wedding in Barbados :) Will continue to use this app for future events. One small issue...it no longer allows me to post on to fb...says cannot connect with your fb account :\\
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Such a cool app makes it more exciting seeing the days go by until the big day
reviews.author: Claire Briley

reviews.comment: Love this app! Only 4 days until I marry my best friend for life. I\'ve checked it a thousand times over! 5/11/13 c and j
reviews.author: Cassia Murray

reviews.title: Wedding countdown
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Love being able to see how many hearbeats and kisses it is til my wedding as well as the normal countdown! However i dont like that you have to pay to upgrade the app when its free initially
reviews.author: Gemma Fogg

reviews.title: No problems yet.
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this running for months and never had a crash.  I like that there are several options for how you want the countdown listed.  It would be nice to see all listed together also.
reviews.author: Barbara Breazeale

reviews.comment: Can u make it say somethin else besides \'wedding and other event\' got this as a countdown foe my bday and I want to be able to customize it to say thatbut it wont let me....
reviews.author: Lilly Kizer

reviews.title: Perfection
reviews.comment: So many great things about this app. I can\'t wait until it says zero. <3
reviews.author: Jordie Blau

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: After upgrading from a BlackBerry I\'m so happy to find a decent wedding countdown
reviews.author: Tracy Steve

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: I love how easy it is to set up. But it could have been more pretty and not so boring but other then that its a really good app. Can\'t wait for my big day August 10, 2013
reviews.author: Randi Thornton

reviews.title: Works... paid, still has a banner
reviews.comment: It works, still has a banner at bottom to promote their own additional apps.  Its ok, functions as advertise. Wish you could save screen on sdcard, without screen shot.
reviews.author: bryan jackson

reviews.title: So much fun to add yo the excitement!
reviews.comment: Love seeing the countdown each day! I was able to customize the picture for our beach wedding.
reviews.author: maris reutzel

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: Exactly what I need to plan my wedding preparation!
reviews.author: Nurul yazlin Yussuf

reviews.title: I love it\342\231\241
reviews.comment: One of \"our\"songs plays when I open it...would be better if I could choose more songs and when I open the app a random song would play.
reviews.author: Teresa Lux

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Loved it. Especially the snapshot feature
reviews.author: Hanaa Oueini

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: A quick, cute, and easy app to set up and put on your home screen as a widget. Extremely good tool to keep track of how much closer and quicker your biggest and one of the most important day of your life or a person you love\'s day of their life\'s time for two hearts to join into one.
reviews.author: Dominique Domagala

reviews.title: I enjoy this app
reviews.comment: I agree with the time should start at midnight but I understand why it\'s that way....after my wedding it started to count down my 1st anniversary which I think is cool...it help me understand n realise that im married.like it sunk in lol...love it app!!!!! Thanks....
reviews.author: dominique white

reviews.title: Brilliant app
reviews.comment: Simple and easy to use :)
reviews.author: Jade Stewart
